short_description: quantum ltd. is a heating & air conditioning services company based in slemani, iraq.
long_description: our mission is to solve complex engineering challenges with sustainable solutions, reducing co2 footprint and energy consumption. quantum excels in providing hvac solutions, delivering a full range of engineering services to include system design, project consultancy, installation, maintenance and after sale services. quantum offers a wide range of hvac solutions with specialisation in: technical ac solutions, air solutions, heating solutions, hot water solutions and specialised solutions. we offer technical and after-project care for every solution. we specialise in: unitary, vrf, chillers & heat pumps, ahu, condensing units, hydronic fancoil units, underfloor cooling and swimming pool units. our air solutions focus on delivering efficient and sustainable systems to ensure maximum air quality. we specialise in the following solutions: heat (energy) recovery ventilators, air humidifiers, air dehumidifiers and accessories. quantumscape ltd offers specialised engineering solutions to solve complex projects.

generated_description: quantum co. is a company based in slemani, sulaymaniyah governorate, iraq, specializing in heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (hvac) solutions. established in 2007, it was the first company in kurdistan to adopt modern hvac systems. offers a wide range of hvac solutions, including chillers, vrf systems, radiant cooling and heating systems, and underfloor cooling and heating systems. the company provides comprehensive services such as system design, project consultancy, installation, maintenance, and after-sale services. is known for its expertise in complex hvac projects and is a member of ecogroup global, focusing on sustainable design and build solutions.
